item.title: Awards
item.description: HONORS & AWARDS 2021-23: Graduate Merit Fellowship, Sun Yat-sen University 2022: Outstanding Thesis, the 1st “Silver Age Award” Essay Contest, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences 2020: National Scholarship, Chinese Ministry of Education 2018-20: Undergraduate Merit Scholarship, Sun Yat-sen University 2019: First Prize, the 10th “Focus on Society” Social Survey Competition, Sun Yat-sen University 2019: Third Prize, the 4th Youth Studies Competition, Sun Yat-sen University 2019: Third Prize, Special Funds for the Cultivation of Undergraduate Students’ Scientific Capacity, Sun Yat-sen University

item.title: Research
item.description: Conference Presentation 2023 Wei, J. “Trends in Returns to Secondary Vocational Education in China (2005-2017): An Analysis Using Age-Period-Cohort Model” (In Chinese). Urban Social Forum 2023, Editorial Department of Sociological Studies, Guangzhou. Wei, J. “Deinstitutionalization or Reinstitutionalization: Examining the Evolution of Returns to College in China’s Public Sectors (2003-2021)” (In Chinese). Annual Meeting of Chinese Sociological Association (CSA 2023), Tianjin. 2022 Wei, J. “Analyzing the Impact of Housing Acquisition on Youth Consumption in Urban China: Evidence from China Family Panel Studies 2016-2018” (In Chinese).
